title.rendered: NEW: Abrams for Governor Launches New Ad Highlighting Abrams’ Economic Plan to Ensure All Georgians Have the Opportunity to Thrive

content.rendered:
ATLANTA – Today, Abrams for Governor launched a new ad highlighting Stacey Abrams’ commitment to ensure all Georgians have the opportunity to thrive by investing in education, small businesses, rural communities and more. The new ad, “Good At Math,” comes after Abrams’ “Georgia Thrives” economic address where she laid out her plans to invest in Georgia’s families and children and build a future where everyone can thrive — all without raising taxes. 

In the ad, Abrams encourages Georgians to “check [her] math and check out [her] plan” to uplift Georgia’s families. Abrams is the only candidate with a comprehensive plan to build One Georgia and put money in the pockets of Georgians without raising taxes. 

“Good At Math” can be viewed here. A transcript is below:

Abrams: So what are you looking for in a governor?

Georgian #1: She should invest in the fundamentals like education and public safety.

Georgian #2: And help small businesses grow.

Georgian #3: Look out for rural Georgia, not just millionaires.

Georgian #4: Not raise taxes.

Abrams: That’s why we need a Governor who’s good at math. My plan will put money back into the pocket of middle class Georgians, create a small business investment fund and one for family farms, solve the housing crisis…all without raising taxes.

Check my Math. And check out my plan.

As Governor, I’ll work for one Georgia where we all rise.

###
